description: [TA2541](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1018) has uploaded malware to various platforms including Google Drive, Pastetext, Sharetext, and GitHub.(Citation: Proofpoint TA2541 February 2022)(Citation: Cisco Operation Layover September 2021)

external_references.description: Larson, S. and Wise, J. (2022, February 15). Charting TA2541's Flight. Retrieved September 12, 2023.
Ventura, V. (2021, September 16). Operation Layover: How we tracked an attack on the aviation industry to five years of compromise. Retrieved September 15, 2023.
